official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should encourage and support the Republic of Ireland in its development of an international world trade and financial center in Dublin, Ireland.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should support the Republic of Ireland in its development of an international world trade and financial center in Dublin, Ireland.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should encourage and support the Republic of Ireland in its development of an international world trade and financial center in Dublin, Ireland.
